ModMetaData.name: More and Better Deep Drill
ModMetaData.author: DarthCY
ModMetaData.description:
Add 3 types of DeepDrill into the game.
Ranged deep drill: mine all the resources on the map.
Large deep drill: bigger version of ranged deep drill, allowing up to 12 colonists to operate at meantime.
Archotech deep drill: can drill specified resources from the void, without restrict of map.
